result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for defining repository interfaces and implementations for managing various data entities in a database.
result.architecture: The folder follows a repository pattern architecture, encapsulating data access logic and providing a clean interface for data manipulation.

repositories/announcement.go.purpose: This file defines an interface for managing announcements in a repository pattern.

repositories/code_version.go.purpose: This file defines a repository for managing code version records in a database.

repositories/common.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing common entities in a database.

repositories/contract.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing contract data in a database.

repositories/dapp.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing decentralized applications (DApps) in a database.

repositories/highlight.go.purpose: This file defines a repository for managing highlights in a database using GORM.

repositories/init.go.purpose: Provides pagination functionality for database queries using GORM.

repositories/network.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing network data in a database.

repositories/preference.go.purpose: This file defines a repository for managing user preferences in a database using GORM.

repositories/quickaccess.go.purpose: This file defines a repository interface and implementation for managing Quick Access DApps in a database using GORM.

repositories/trusted_domain.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing trusted domains in a database.
